circumstances: Amanda Cox, a 9-year-old girl, was reported missing from her home at 312 Greengairs Road, Greengairs. She was experiencing an identity crisis, struggling with her place within her foster family. Amanda was part of an after-school program that often took field trips, including one recent visit to a remote island. It's plausible that inspired by this trip, Amanda might have resolved to revisit this destination in an attempt to find some clarity or escape. On the day of her disappearance, one of her friends, Kimberley Walsh, mentioned Amanda seemed unusually quiet during their time together at the after-school program. Concerned, Kimberley informed Amanda's foster mother about her worries. She was later traced at her home address by police, safe and sound.
